&FlowMultiTagRowRequest; declare @p char(6), @r nvarchar(4000), @q nvarchar(4000) declare @ext varchar(3), @masterTable varchar(33), @detailTable varchar(33) select @ext = case when @loai_ct = '1' then '71' when @loai_ct = '2' then '72' when @loai_ct = '3' then '74' else '78' end select @masterTable = 'm' + @ext + '$%Partition', @detailTable = 'd' + @ext + '$%Partition'
if exists (select 1 from #tagRow where p is null) begin set @r = 'update #tagRow set p = convert(char(6), b.ngay_ct, 112) from #tagRow a join c' + @ext + '$000000 b on b.stt_rec = a.stt_rec' exec sp_executesql @r end
select top 0 tr.id, he_so, cp_nt, a.tien0 as tien0, a.tien as tien3, cp, rtrim(a.so_ct) as hd_so, b.volume, b.weight &FlowMultiUserDefinedFieldsQuery; into #d from #tagRow tr cross join d73$000000 a cross join dmvt b
set @r = ' insert into #d select tr.id, a.he_so, 0, ' + case when @loai_ct = '3' then 'a.tien' else 'a.tien0' end + ', a.tien, 0, rtrim(a.so_ct), b.volume, b.weight &FlowMultiUserDefinedFieldsQuery; from (select id, stt_rec, stt_rec0 from #tagRow where p = ''%Partition'') tr join ' + @detailTable + ' a on tr.stt_rec = a.stt_rec and tr.stt_rec0 = a.stt_rec0 left join dmvt b on a.ma_vt = b.ma_vt '
select distinct p into #p from #tagRow select @p = min(p) from #p while @p is not null begin set @q = replace(@r, '%Partition', @p) exec sp_executesql @q select @p = min(p) from #p where p > @p end
select '' as array$, id, &OtherCopyField; from #d &FlowMultiOrderBy; return
